title: Creator produces age-appropriate content for local youth
description: Creator produces age-appropriate content for local youth
content:
Scenario: Creator produces age-appropriate content for local youth
    Given Sam creates content about neighborhood nature exploration
    And the content is designed for children aged 8-12
    When Sam contributes the content to educational spaces
    Then the guardian agent verifies age-appropriateness
    And local children can access the content safely
    And parents can review and approve their children's participation
    And Sam helps children learn about their local environment
    And community benefits from quality youth programming
